about_the_game:
Head into the legendary Phoenix Palace with this tileset for RPG Maker! Has fiery oranges and moody purple tones, lava and of course a variety of statues for the guardians of the Phoenix!

This Phoenix Tileset Includes:

Ground Tiles:

Heat things up with lots of lava tiles!
Dark ground – settles into the background and lets the fire stand out!
Fiery tiles – Show off important areas with an orange-edged tile.
Edged purple tiles – Or use cool contrasting tiles instead.
Glittery fire path – Add just a touch of shining tiles here and there!
2 matching spike traps
Fiery weeds
Lava edges

Walls:

Dark walls, light walls, stone and brick…all with orange tones to let them easily mix and match. One roof tile also included.

Stairs:

North-south stairs to match all floors!

Also featuring:

small accent pillars
large accent pillars (plain and themed)
plain arch
detailed arch
raised platform
coordinated throne
fire-window (small and large)
treasure box
push block
bridge rails
multiple statues
magic rings
glowing lanterns
diagonal stairs
ladders
plus more!

Events and Animations:

Treasure chest and various fire animations for torches!

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
